insert into tb_buy_taxbill(no, manage_no, write_date, total_supply_value, total_tax_value, tax_type, insert_userid, insert_day) values (#{no },#{manageNo },#{writeDate },#{totalSupplyValue },#{totalTaxValue },#{taxType },#{insertUserid },now())
